original_title: Mr. Dressup: Tickle Trunk Treasures - Blue
overview: oin hosts Casey and Finnegan in this special video collection as they revisit carefree childhood memories of Mr. Dressup, and they romp again through those special days with songs, stories and Mr. Dressup's drawings at his famous drawing board.
tagline: Ernie Coombs (Mr. Dressup) brightened CBC's morning schedule for an incredible 32 years.
title: Mr. Dressup: Tickle Trunk Treasures - Blue
